In this fifth part of the book, our focus will be on the the following chapters:

-   In @sec-time-series we will get to understand the basics of the time series.

-   In @sec-svm we will dive into support vector machine.

-   In @sec-semi-sup we will understand semi-supervised learning.

-   In @sec-basics-nn we will dive into neural networks.
